title: Trade, a sudden exit, Middle East conflict - five takeaways from G7
description: This year's summit in Canada did not go as planned, but leaders of the world's wealthiest nations still secured some wins.
content:
Jessica Murphy
Canada's G7 summit, under first-time host Mark Carney, had a carefully planned agenda. 
That programme was upended by the unfolding war between Israel and Iran and US President Donal… [+6738 chars]
